column1: A funeral service in celebration of her life will be held on Wednesday at 11:00 am at Irwin-Beck Funeral Home & Cremation Service Inc.
column3: Spring Grove with Chaplain Joy Hovis officiating. Following the service she will be laid to rest next to her husband at St. Peter Lischey�s Cemetery in Spring Grove. The family will receive friends on Tuesday from 6-8 pm and on Wednesday from 10 � 11 am at the funeral home.
